about_the_game:
Doodle Tank Commander is a strategy game where you set up an army and face another enemy tank army.
The composition of enemy tanks and the positions will make each level different in how you can approach it.

Area damage, armor penetration, flanking, tank speed, shielding from enemy fire and damage per second are key factors in understanding how to win a level.

Army Builder

Six slots that can be used to create your own tanks.
  • Double MG tower with light fast body armor?
  • Rocket tower for high range and area damage mounted on a heavy slow tank?
  • Laser tower on a cheap medium health tank body for good damage per second material cost ratio?

Tank parts are easily swaped out to find tank combinations suitable to win a level.

Tank Puzzler

Each level tries to introduce new concepts and enemy tank combinations that have to be dealt with.
A typical round of doodle tank commander involves:
  • Design your tanks
  • Spend your per level limited materials to place the tanks at the bottom
  • The game is paused and the enemy can be analyzed until your press play
  • Once a round starts, the game is mainly observed how it plays out
  • A level is won when achieving a higher score then the enemy
  • Each tank that makes it to the other end achieves a score
  • Rounds can also be won by achieving a higher score without defeating all enemy tanks
  • Solving a level unlocks the next levels on the map and unlocks new tank parts or ugprades existing parts

Features

  • Play through 50+ handcrafted challenging levels
  • All art is hand drawn on paper
  • Unlock 40+ tank parts of the blue biro battalion or the black fineliner force
  • Army designer to combine tank parts
  • Save formations and re use them in other levels
  • Try to solve level with less materials and get all the gold stars

name: Doodle Tank Commander

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: The game is lightweight and designed to run on most modern systems, but performance may vary depending on the size of battles.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics with OpenGL 2.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card

short_description: Combine tank bodies and turrets to create an army that can blast through the enemy in this tank puzzling strategy game. Unlock new tank parts and find a solution to solve every level with the correct counter or by earning points with vehicles making it to the other side.
